ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 289
ygData.msgSnippet: That s a little different.  I bake, so I know that the pointer can hold multiple things that don t stack.  For instance, when I make soup, I use a pot, and if
ygData.messageBody:
That's a little different. I bake, so I know that the pointer can hold
multiple things that don't stack. For instance, when I make soup, I use a
pot, and if I succeed I get the soup and the pot on the pointer, but soups
and pots can't stack. I think the pointer just contains a list of items on
it, not a single stackable item.

However, that being said, I agree with the alcohol being stackable and
activatable doesn't fit with this statement :)

Tinik Gutenungrie
Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan

From: "Aranathes Bonethrower" <aranathes@...>
